Version 1.7.12 - CRITICAL: Fix IOMAD Error & Restrict Plugin Access

Fixes critical IOMAD error and properly restricts plugin access

Who Can Access the Plugin:

  • Site Administrators: Full access
  • IOMAD Company Managers: System-level companymanager (assigned via IOMAD UI)
  • Category Managers: Manager roles at category level

Who NO LONGER Has Access:

  • Course-level managers
  • Teachers (editingteacher)
  • Students

What This Upgrade Does:

  • Unassigns editingteacher role at system level (for users with teacher roles at course/category)
  • Unassigns student role at system level (for users with student roles at course/category)
  • Unassigns companymanager role at system level (for users who are NOT actual IOMAD managers)
  • Removes the function that assigned system-level roles on install/upgrade

Technical Changes:

  • has_admin_or_manager_role() now only checks SYSTEM and CATEGORY contexts (not COURSE)
  • Removed xmldb_local_sm_estratoos_plugin_assign_system_roles() function
  • configure_webservices() no longer adds capabilities to teacher/student roles
  • Observer only invalidates caches, does not assign roles
